Articles.Content:
Sorry if this has been suggested but I didn't see it in the already suggested list.

I think it would be great if we had a list of completed science experiments / observations.

You may be a no mods type, but the Research Overview mod does just what you're wanting. Check it out.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/53952-Research-Development-Overview-*Permanent-Update-Thread
Thanks. This looks like a pretty useful mod that I'll be using. I am a bit of a mod minimalist however, so hopefully they will add this functionality to the vanilla game at some point.
